description:
About Us:

Clayworks is a dynamic and innovative player in the commercial real estate cum hospitality sector, committed to delivering unparalleled experiences to our clients. With a focus on creating exceptional spaces and providing top\-notch service, we are seeking an MEP Engineer to join our team. Who are passionate about Electrical engineering and have an interest in real estate and hospitality, this position offers an interesting opportunity.

Role Overview:

In this role, you will play a crucial part in ensuring the seamless design, installation, and maintenullce of machinal, electrical, plumbing and IT systems in building projects. Your responsibilities will span across project planning, design review, budgeting, vendor management, quality assurance, construction supervision, risk management, documentation, and client communication. This position requires a strong background in Electrical engineering.

Location: Bangalore, India

Work mode: On\-site

Job\-type: Full\-time

Industry: Commercial Real Estate

Roles \& Responsibilities

* Design coordination with architect, Structural/Services consultant, and others with ability of problem\-solving at the site.
* Review the design feasibility proposed by Architect / Services Consultant and give inputs based on design constraints in line with time and cost.
* Checking plans, drawings, and quantities for accuracy of calculations.
* Ensuring that all materials used are as per approved specifications.
* Overseeing the selection and requisition of materials.
* Resolving technical issues with contractor representatives, suppliers, and subcontractors.
* Quality control in accordance with standard method statements, quality plans, inspection and test plans prepared by the project management team and by the subcontractors.
* Act as the single point driving force at site driving the diverse team of contractors, sub\-contractors and other vendors.
* Prepare \& monitor Project Schedule.
* Planning the work efficiently organizing the site facilities to meet agreed deadlines.
* Involved in procurement process and negotiating contracts with external vendors to reach profitable agreements for various packages of the project.
* To meet assigned budget by monitoring project expenditures and identifying variables and highlight time to time in case of any cost variation.
* Ensuring that all safety precautions have been taken into consideration and implemented properly.

Clayworks

* Co\-ordination with the office team and informing them of the project status regularly.
* Prepare weekly and monthly site reports.
* Resolve any unexpected technical difficulties and other problems that may arise and discuss with Senior Project Manager / other higher personnel to plan for mitigation.
* Conducting weekly site review meetings and sharing MOMs of the meetings with project

stakeholders.

* Conducting on\-site measurements of the executed activities and Certification of bills.
* Testing and commissioning of Electrical, HVAC, FAPA, Data \& allied services.
* Preparation and documentation of project commissioning and handover reports.
* Successfully handover the project to operations team with submission of all testing \&

commissioning reports, demo of all systems and asset handover duly positioning as per final

approved layout.

* Documentation of the project process from initiation till handover.

QUALIFICATION \& EXPERIENCE

Diploma or Bachelorâ€™s degree in Electrical engineering or a related field with 0\-3 years of experience. Strong knowledge of MEP design principles, codes, and standards. Proficiency in computer, aided design (CAD) software and relevant engineering tools. Excellent communication and teamwork.

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: â‚¹600,000\.00 \- â‚¹700,000\.00 per year

Benefits:

* Cell phone reimbursement
* Health insurance
* Provident Fund

Schedule:

* Day shift

Supplemental Pay:

* Performance bonus

Work Location: In person

Expected Start Date: 10/02/2025

title: Senior Pre-Sales Engineer (India - Remote)
description:
**Job description**

**Company Overview:**

Mapsted (www.mapsted.com) is a global leader in innovative location\-based technology, distinguished by its proprietary hardware\-free solutions. Founded in 2014, the company has pioneered the transformation of data chaos into actionable intelligence through advanced AI and machine learning. Mapsted has meticulously mapped over one billion square feet of indoor space and holds more than 100 patents, showcasing its commitment to trailblazing innovation. Its unique ability to deliver scalable, beacon\-free indoor positioning with an accuracy of 1â€“5 meters places it at the forefront of the industry.

**Job Summary:**

The Senior Pre\-Sales Engineer will play a critical role in driving technical sales efforts by working closely with enterprise customers, sales teams, and partners in the UK \& EMEA region. This role requires deep technical expertise, strong solution\-selling skills, and the ability to engage with clients to demonstrate and position complex solutions. The ideal candidate will bridge the gap between technical solutions and business needs, supporting the sales cycle from initial discovery to closing deals.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**1\. Technical Sales Support \& Solution Design**

* Collaborate with sales teams to understand customer requirements and propose tailored solutions.
* Conduct product demonstrations, proof\-of\-concept (PoC) engagements, and technical deep\-dives for prospective clients.
* Provide pre\-sales technical support by addressing product\-related queries and advising on deployment strategies.
* Design and recommend architecture and integration solutions based on customer needs and industry best practices.

**2\. Customer Engagement \& Technical Consultations**

* Act as a trusted technical advisor to customers, ensuring solutions align with their business challenges and IT environments.
* Lead technical discovery sessions to gather and analyze customer pain points and translate them into actionable solutions.
* Deliver customer presentations, webinars, and workshops to showcase technical capabilities.
* Assist in developing RFP (Request for Proposal) responses and technical documentation.

**3\. Collaboration with Internal \& External Stakeholders**

* Work closely with Sales, Product Management, and Engineering teams to align solutions with customer expectations.
* Support channel partners, system integrators, and resellers in positioning and selling solutions.
* Provide feedback to the product development team based on customer requirements and market trends.

**4\. Competitive Analysis \& Market Intelligence**

* Stay updated on industry trends, competitors, and emerging technologies to position offerings effectively.
* Conduct competitive analysis and benchmarking to highlight product differentiators.
* Provide insights to sales and marketing teams to refine go\-to\-market strategies.

**5\. Technical Enablement \& Training**

* Assist in training sales teams, partners, and customers on product capabilities and technical use cases.
* Develop technical content, whitepapers, FAQs, and best practice guides to enhance knowledge sharing.
* Participate in industry conferences, events, and trade shows to represent the company and engage with prospects.

**Qualifications \& Requirements:**

* 7\+ years in pre\-sales engineering, solutions architecture, or technical consulting in a B2B enterprise environment.
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, or related fields (or equivalent experience).
* Strong expertise in solution design, cloud architectures (AWS, Azure, GCP), networking, and security.
* Proficiency in API integrations, SaaS, and enterprise software deployments.
* Exceptional communication, presentation, and stakeholder management skills.
* Ability to translate technical concepts into business value for customers.
* Strong problem\-solving and consultative sales approach.
* Comfortable working in fast\-paced, high\-growth environments.

Job Type: Full\-time

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday

Work Location: Remote

title: Recruiter (12 month contract)
description:
We are looking for a **Recruiter (contract)** to help us grow our office in Bangalore. You will be the driving force behind finding and engaging with some of the finest talent in the industry as we scale our team from the ground up. This is an exciting time to be part of the rocketship and the Databricks expansion in India.



Recruiters at Databricks are subject matter experts when it comes to talent attraction and are given full autonomy to bring new ideas and creative approaches to life.



You will work with hiring managers as a strategic partner advising on things such as sourcing strategies, passive engagement strategies, competitive intelligence, DEI, and talent insights. You will have an opportunity to work on multiple positions across Engineering / Tech Solutions / Finullce \& Accounting / IT / Security and many more !  

  

If you're someone who's passionate about recruiting , sourcing, enjoys using alternative techniques to find diverse talent pools, and relishes having the creative freedom to try new things, then apply below!


**The impact you will have:**


* Drive talent acquisition efforts by extensively sourcing and engaging with highly skilled professionals in Bangalore.
* Contribute to the growth and success of Databricks in India by building a strong pipeline of top\-tier candidates.
* Collaborate with the APJ recruiting team and hiring managers to understand the hiring needs and develop effective sourcing strategies.
* Ensure a positive candidate experience throughout the sourcing and evaluation process, acting as a brand ambassador for Databricks.
* Play a key role in building a diverse and inclusive workforce, promoting equal opportunity and representation in technical roles.


**What we look for:**


* Proven experience as a Recruiter or similar role in the technology industry.
* Strong understanding of technical / non tech roles, and the ability to effectively assess candidates' technical skills across all experience levels (Entry to Senior)
* Extremely hands on with sourcing, leveraging different tools \& platforms to source \& recruit strong Tech \& Non Tech talent
* Expertise in hiring Software Engineers across domains like Big Data, ML, Infrastructure, Databases , Storage etc is a plus
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage candidates, build relationships, and effectively represent Databricks' values and culture.
* Familiarity with applicant tracking systems (ATS) and other recruitment software for efficient candidate management and tracking.
* Someone who thinks beyond the usual tools and creates innovative solutions to finding, engaging \& hiring the very best people.

**About Databricks**



Databricks is the data and AI company. More than 10,000 organizations worldwide â€” including Comcast, CondÃ© Nast, Grammarly, and over 50% of the Fortune 500 â€” rely on the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform to unify and democratize data, analytics and AI. Databricks is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices around the globe and was founded by the original creators of Lakehouse, Apache Sparkâ„¢, Delta Lake and MLflow. To learn more, follow Databricks on Twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook.  

  

**Benefits**  

  

At Databricks, we strive to provide comprehensive benefits and perks that meet the needs of all of our employees. For specific details on the benefits offered in your region, please visit https://www.mybenefitsnow.com/databricks.

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**



At Databricks, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive culture where everyone can excel. We take great care to ensure that our hiring practices are inclusive and meet equal employment opportunity standards. Individuals looking for employment at Databricks are considered without regard to age, color, disability, ethnicity, family or marital status, gender identity or expression, language, national origin, physical and mental ability, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, socio\-economic status, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.


**Compliance**

title: Applied Scientist
description:
About Oracle and OHAI


Building off our Cloud momentum, Oracle has formed a new organization \- Oracle Health \& AI. This team will focus on product development and product strategy for Oracle Health, while building out a complete platform supporting modernized, automated healthcare. This is a net new line of business, constructed with an entrepreneurial spirit that promotes an energetic and creative environment. We are unencumbered and will need your contribution to make it a world class engineering center with the focus on excellence.


About ODA


Within the larger Oracle Health \& AI organization, the Oracle Digital Assistant (ODA) is an Assistant platform that enables developers to create their own skills and digital assistants using the Conversational AI and Generative AI capabilities exposed to them in a low\-code paradigm. The ODA team has been powering conversational AI experiences for all internal Oracle teams and several external customers for the past 7 years and is evolving rapidly to provide Generative AI solutions for the healthcare and enterprise domains. We operate in an agile environment with a substantial charter, high visibility, and support from senior leadership.


About the team


We are looking for ML scientists, Data Engineers, Software Development Engineers, Product/Program Managers and ML engineers with a strong background in machine learning to build industry\-leading solutions. You will work with huge volumes of data to solve/enable solving real\-world problems in the Healthcare domain that are productionized into our Health AI products. Your solutions will be productized as features in the end products. These are new teams that we are putting together in India Center from scratch and the work will span across New Feature Development for CDA Specialty Expansion \& Innovation, Language \& Region Expansion, Software Development across front\-end, back\-end, test automation and mobile, ML Engineering, MLOps, LLMOps, Applied ML Sciences and ML Research, with a huge focus on GenAI capabilities. There is a huge emphasis on Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI. Your contributions will be pivotal in delivering our new Generative AI\-powered solutions for healthcare and enterprise customers.  



Qualifications


* Ph.D. Degree preferred.
* Experience having led multiple projects leveraging LLMs, GenAI and Prompt Engineering Exposure to real\-world MLOps deploying models into production adding features to products
* Knowledge of working in a cloud environment
* 5\+ Years of Experience
* Strong understanding of LLMs, GenAI, Prompt Engineering and Copilot

Career Level \- IC4


  
Responsibilities


* Strong expertise in Python programming and one of the Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch, MXNet, TensorFlow, Keras) and understanding of LLMs, LLMOps and Generative AI \- to be able to deliver per specifications; complete assignments without assistance by exercising judgment \& appropriate actions
* Knowledge of Classification, Prediction, Recommender Systems, Time Series Forecasting, Anomaly Detection, Optimization, Graph ML, NLP. Hands\-on develop ML models using the above techniques
* Ability to both use existing libraries (ML, Deep Learning, Re\-inforcement Learning) as well as design algorithms ground\-up; Able to prepare data pipelines and feature engineering pipelines to build robust models
* Combine ML Sciences depth, programming expertise and mathematical understanding of techniques to deliver state\-of\-the\-art ML solutions for problem solving across Healthcare domain
* Drives selection of methods and techniques to drive solutions
* Demonstrate strong program management to be able to multi\-task effectively
* Be able to mentor \& lead junior data scientists effectively
* Contribute to peer reviews, team learning, meeting product objectives and develop best practices for the organization
* Strong research record preferred demonstrated, through publications
* Scientific thinking and ability to invent: Prior experience creating intellectual property through patents desirable
* Identify and investigate new technologies, prototype and test solutions for product features and design/validate patterns that deliver a compelling experience
* Take responsibility for technical problem solving to meet product objectives and develop best practices
* Ability to resolve complex business problems in creative and effective ways
* Strong experience in LLM Systems and LLMOps. Prior experience with Prompt Engineering and RAG systems

title: MEP Engineer
description:
About Us:

Clayworks is a dynamic and innovative player in the commercial real estate cum hospitality sector, committed to delivering unparalleled experiences to our clients. With a focus on creating exceptional spaces and providing top\-notch service, we are seeking an MEP Engineer to join our team. Who are passionate about Electrical engineering and have an interest in real estate and hospitality, this position offers an interesting opportunity.

Role Overview:

In this role, you will play a crucial part in ensuring the seamless design, installation, and maintenullce of machinal, electrical, plumbing and IT systems in building projects. Your responsibilities will span across project planning, design review, budgeting, vendor management, quality assurance, construction supervision, risk management, documentation, and client communication. This position requires a strong background in Electrical engineering.

Location: Bangalore, India

Work mode: On\-site

Job\-type: Full\-time

Industry: Commercial Real Estate

Roles \& Responsibilities

* Design coordination with architect, Structural/Services consultant, and others with ability of problem\-solving at the site.
* Review the design feasibility proposed by Architect / Services Consultant and give inputs based on design constraints in line with time and cost.
* Checking plans, drawings, and quantities for accuracy of calculations.
* Ensuring that all materials used are as per approved specifications.
* Overseeing the selection and requisition of materials.
* Resolving technical issues with contractor representatives, suppliers, and subcontractors.
* Quality control in accordance with standard method statements, quality plans, inspection and test plans prepared by the project management team and by the subcontractors.
* Act as the single point driving force at site driving the diverse team of contractors, sub\-contractors and other vendors.
* Prepare \& monitor Project Schedule.
* Planning the work efficiently organizing the site facilities to meet agreed deadlines.
* Involved in procurement process and negotiating contracts with external vendors to reach profitable agreements for various packages of the project.
* To meet assigned budget by monitoring project expenditures and identifying variables and highlight time to time in case of any cost variation.
* Ensuring that all safety precautions have been taken into consideration and implemented properly.

Clayworks

* Co\-ordination with the office team and informing them of the project status regularly.
* Prepare weekly and monthly site reports.
* Resolve any unexpected technical difficulties and other problems that may arise and discuss with Senior Project Manager / other higher personnel to plan for mitigation.
* Conducting weekly site review meetings and sharing MOMs of the meetings with project

stakeholders.

* Conducting on\-site measurements of the executed activities and Certification of bills.
* Testing and commissioning of Electrical, HVAC, FAPA, Data \& allied services.
* Preparation and documentation of project commissioning and handover reports.
* Successfully handover the project to operations team with submission of all testing \&

commissioning reports, demo of all systems and asset handover duly positioning as per final

approved layout.

* Documentation of the project process from initiation till handover.

QUALIFICATION \& EXPERIENCE

Diploma or Bachelorâ€™s degree in Electrical engineering or a related field with 0\-3 years of experience. Strong knowledge of MEP design principles, codes, and standards. Proficiency in computer, aided design (CAD) software and relevant engineering tools. Excellent communication and teamwork.

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: â‚¹600,000\.00 \- â‚¹700,000\.00 per year

Benefits:

* Cell phone reimbursement
* Health insurance
* Provident Fund

Schedule:

* Day shift

Supplemental Pay:

* Performance bonus

Work Location: In person

Expected Start Date: 10/02/2025

title: Applied Scientist
description:
About Oracle and OHAI


Building off our Cloud momentum, Oracle has formed a new organization \- Oracle Health \& AI. This team will focus on product development and product strategy for Oracle Health, while building out a complete platform supporting modernized, automated healthcare. This is a net new line of business, constructed with an entrepreneurial spirit that promotes an energetic and creative environment. We are unencumbered and will need your contribution to make it a world class engineering center with the focus on excellence.


About ODA


Within the larger Oracle Health \& AI organization, the Oracle Digital Assistant (ODA) is an Assistant platform that enables developers to create their own skills and digital assistants using the Conversational AI and Generative AI capabilities exposed to them in a low\-code paradigm. The ODA team has been powering conversational AI experiences for all internal Oracle teams and several external customers for the past 7 years and is evolving rapidly to provide Generative AI solutions for the healthcare and enterprise domains. We operate in an agile environment with a substantial charter, high visibility, and support from senior leadership.


About the team


We are looking for ML scientists, Data Engineers, Software Development Engineers, Product/Program Managers and ML engineers with a strong background in machine learning to build industry\-leading solutions. You will work with huge volumes of data to solve/enable solving real\-world problems in the Healthcare domain that are productionized into our Health AI products. Your solutions will be productized as features in the end products. These are new teams that we are putting together in India Center from scratch and the work will span across New Feature Development for CDA Specialty Expansion \& Innovation, Language \& Region Expansion, Software Development across front\-end, back\-end, test automation and mobile, ML Engineering, MLOps, LLMOps, Applied ML Sciences and ML Research, with a huge focus on GenAI capabilities. There is a huge emphasis on Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI. Your contributions will be pivotal in delivering our new Generative AI\-powered solutions for healthcare and enterprise customers.  



Qualifications


* Ph.D. Degree preferred.
* Experience having led multiple projects leveraging LLMs, GenAI and Prompt Engineering Exposure to real\-world MLOps deploying models into production adding features to products
* Knowledge of working in a cloud environment
* 5\+ Years of Experience
* Strong understanding of LLMs, GenAI, Prompt Engineering and Copilot

Career Level \- IC4


  
Responsibilities


* Strong expertise in Python programming and one of the Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch, MXNet, TensorFlow, Keras) and understanding of LLMs, LLMOps and Generative AI \- to be able to deliver per specifications; complete assignments without assistance by exercising judgment \& appropriate actions
* Knowledge of Classification, Prediction, Recommender Systems, Time Series Forecasting, Anomaly Detection, Optimization, Graph ML, NLP. Hands\-on develop ML models using the above techniques
* Ability to both use existing libraries (ML, Deep Learning, Re\-inforcement Learning) as well as design algorithms ground\-up; Able to prepare data pipelines and feature engineering pipelines to build robust models
* Combine ML Sciences depth, programming expertise and mathematical understanding of techniques to deliver state\-of\-the\-art ML solutions for problem solving across Healthcare domain
* Drives selection of methods and techniques to drive solutions
* Demonstrate strong program management to be able to multi\-task effectively
* Be able to mentor \& lead junior data scientists effectively
* Contribute to peer reviews, team learning, meeting product objectives and develop best practices for the organization
* Strong research record preferred demonstrated, through publications
* Scientific thinking and ability to invent: Prior experience creating intellectual property through patents desirable
* Identify and investigate new technologies, prototype and test solutions for product features and design/validate patterns that deliver a compelling experience
* Take responsibility for technical problem solving to meet product objectives and develop best practices
* Ability to resolve complex business problems in creative and effective ways
* Strong experience in LLM Systems and LLMOps. Prior experience with Prompt Engineering and RAG systems

* This role is very critical in todayâ€™s scenario. The role includes (but not limited to) handling of multiple cluster warehouses \& their efficient operations for all categories
* The position handles Circle Warehousing and Logistics Operations (Capex, Opex/Marcom and SRN).
* Responsible for efficient Materials management (network equipment, Tradable, Marcom) and warehousing excellence to support network expansion and make best supply chain delivery of Tradable and Marcom to entire geography of Circle
* Responsible for management of the WH, SRN (including Repair/Return), Opex (Sales \& Marketing), and all Zonal warehouses in line with organization policies
* Now with fast changing technology (2G,3G,4G, 5G) there is lot of action on network swap and efficient site return management. While rendering efficient logistics (forward \& reverse) and warehousing the position also focuses on value engineering opportunities
* The key job purpose of the role is to have complete monitoring, control, reconciliation and reporting on the warehouse(s) and their inventories by adhering to the highest levels of warehouse standards on all aspects (i.e., warehousing, housekeeping, safety and security, scrap disposals etc.).
* A custodian of huge company assets, complex operations and handling of large 3PL workforce (40\+)
  
  

**Key Result Areas/Accountabilities**

  

This position is an active enabler in the following key deliverables\-


* Support Huge network roll out and help telecom network modernization as per business plan
* Efficient SCM of tradable (distribution) to support Revenue generation (Kitting to Delivery). No stock outs can be afforded in the trade, in full delivery of POP and Merchandising items to enhance brand visibility

**Warehousing\-**


The role requires handling of end to end warehouse management of multiple warehouse(s) in the cluster for Network, Opex (SIMs), Marcom (PoS etc.). The role has to cater to important deliverables by maintaining minimum cost, high efficiency, safety and 100% compliance to HSW


* **Managing huge Network roll\-out, swap activity, consolidation of network, huge SRN transactions and scrap disposals**
* **Maintain strict inventory controls and minimum Warehouse Residency to ensure high Inventory Turnover Ratio (ITR).**
* **Handle multiple local transporters (sometimes politically influenced) and local unions to ensure optimum \& timely availability of HSW compliant vehicles for network roll\-out**
* **Most of the workforce (going upto 50\+ numbers per Circle) is less educated (low skilled and/or semi\-skilled labours), still the position needs to support timely network roll out and efficient tradable supply chain.**
* **Continuous engagement of Drivers, labourers through Trainings, team development \& motivation**
* **Often serves calls beyond duty due to business urgencies from user functions**
* **Warehouse operations for minimum 6 days a week (and sometimes even on Sundays to meet the business requirement) â€“ almost 12\-14 hours a day**
* **Space Management (manage more in less)**
* **Ensure appropriate stock of SIMs to support business growth**
* **Short notice from Sales team to organize Sim Kitting and dispatches of Tradable (which are the main source of revenue)**
* **GST compliance for stock transfer, market dispatches, reverse logistics, SRN, Swap and Scrap**
* Most importantly this position manages the physical area, assets, labours, 3 PLs on ground and all the time supports business growth.
* Interacts with senior team members of network, marketing, sales and retail functions to coordinate and manage warehousing and logistics

**Inventory Controls\-**


* Tracking warehouse performance KPIs \& improvement plans
* Provide visibility of inventory to user teams for effective deployment and monitoring in cluster
* Coordinate with Network \& SSC for operations and reconciliation aspects of NSS (Network Stock Solution)
* Manage reporting, compliances and interface for auditors and ensuring any supporting required for audit and any issues are addressed in timely manner
* Conduct internal audits to assure VIL processes and standards, pertaining to Good Receipt (GRN)/ Goods Issue (GI)/ Compliance / HSW etc.

**Logistics\-**


* Managing the primary logistics in close coordination with the category manager in commercial (i.e., movement of materials from vendor factories, import ports to multiple warehouse in the cluster) at minimum costs
* Ensuring timely availability of HSW compliant vehicles \& drivers to ship network equipment from warehouse(s) to sites and thereafter return of swap/switched\-off equipmentâ€™s packed (in good condition) back to warehouse from sites
* Transportation Efficiency \- Optimize the secondary transportation routes, loads and frequency and thereby reduce the overall transportation spend
* Route planning and monitoring material movement to multiple sites and other clusters
* Movement of tradable i.e., SIM/POP to distributors, retailers and other zonal locations through a team of couriers
* Co\-ordinate with TPL vendors and validation of their performance and invoices
* Driving and Implementation of Intelligent Transport \& Courier Management System (ITCMS) to ensure greater controls, compliances and keep a check \& tight control on logistics cost

**Warehouse Safety, Security \& Audits\-**


* Ensure 5S in warehouse
* Drive safety initiatives \& awareness programs in warehouse
* Compliance to Record keeping
* Routine audits
* Stock count, Monthly reconciliation
* Any other audits being recommended from time to time

**Health Safety Well\-being (HSW) Warehouse Management\-**


* Ensuring HSW compliance in Warehouse
* Conduct Monthly Audits at Warehouse
* Ensure 100% vehicle and driver inspection
* Training â€“ in\-house and to contractors/drivers
  
  

**Core Competencies, Knowledge, Experience**

  

* High level of Integrity, ethics and other value systems
* Strong Knowledge and understanding of Supply Chain management (Warehousing \& Logistics)
* Ability to manage multiple senior stake holders/Vertical Heads
* Excellent coordination skills and ability to deal with transporters, unions \& uneducated labourers
* Ability to work long hours and in extreme weather conditions (in warehouse) and emergency situations
* Good communication, presentation, excel skills, MIS, and experience on ERP
  
  

**Technical / professional qualifications**

  

* BE preferably with MBA
Background in Warehousing, Logistics and Supply Chain  
* 
  

**Years of Experience**

  

7\-15 years

description:
### **Description**

  

ROLE TITLE: Associate Software Engineer (Java / .Net) ECF LEVEL: L2 FUNCTION: IBHQ \- DQO REGION: New Business Development Division / India Software Development Centre REPORTING: General Manager LOCATION: Hyderabad, India COMPANY OVERVIEW As a global leader in cash technology solutions, we provide the finullcial, retail, cash centre and gaming industries with confidence that their cash is protected and always working to help build a stronger business. Our cash automation technologies and process engineering services help businesses in more than 100 countries optimise the handling, movement and management of cash. While we span the globe, we personally engage with each customer to address their unique challenges and goals enhancing staff efficiency, reducing operating costs and enabling a more rewarding customer experience. We offer peace of mind. We enable transformation. We generate options. We empower people. We do all this by releasing companies from the burden of cash management, putting cash to work, and helping customers enhance the value that their staff and facilities add to their business. We pride ourselves on customer focus, solution quality and our great team. We are growing and diversifying and are looking for talented people who are passionate about what they do and want to contribute to the next phase in our companys success. ROLE PURPOSE Located in the heart of Hyderabad in a modern high\-tech office setting, we have vacancies for Associate level .Net \& Java engineers to join our team and support software development, covering all aspects of development, testing and implementation of Glory products. MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES Writing \& debugging code Troubleshooting software issues Working closely with Hyderabad Team to improve product software functionality Attending software meetings / code reviews and QA activities Continually improving coding skills EDUCATION, QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE B.E., B.Tech., M.Sc., MCA Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field. Minimum 3 years progressive working experience English speaking (including written/oral) and must be able to confidently communicate with different audiences within the company (requirement is essential). Technical Skills Required \- Java Engineer Tech stack : Angular / Spring Boot / Rest API / SQL Server Must have skills: Excellent programming skills in Java / JavaScript. Programming skill in AngularTS. Administration and configuration of Java Enterprise Application Server (Tomcat, JBoss, WebSphere). Programming with SQL databases (Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle). RestAPI programming. Solid understanding of network security protocols. Reporting engines \- Jasper Reports. Able to trouble shoot IT issues at an enterprise level. Understands customer issues presented in a non\-technical way, and to find their technical root cause. Experience in load tests using Junit test cases. Technical Skills Required \- .Net Engineer Tech stack: .Net (Dot Net framework) / ASP.Net / SOAP Web services / SQL Server Must have skills: Programming language: C\# (UI), C\+\+, .Net Core, ASP.Net SOAP webservice with axis2c, Apache web server, NginX web server Programming with SQL databases (Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle). RestAPI programming. Solid understanding of network security protocols. Able to troubleshoot IT issues at an enterprise level Understands customer issues presented in a non\-technical way, and to find their technical root cause. REQUIRED COMPETENCIES TO BE SUCCESSFUL AS A SOFTWARE ENGINEER INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING: General Characteristics Understands how own work contributes toward company objectives. Prioritises own workload to achieve key milestones. Learns from mistakes. Embraces change; accepting of new ideas, methods and ways of working. Technical Ability Able to function in a team environment. Applies learning to improve knowledge and develop/build technical expertise. Performs at a basic level; is competent and absorbs Managerial Accountability No managerial responsibility required at this level. Achieving High Performance Regularly monitored and receives some level of supervision in day\-to\-day work. Receives direction on unconventional and/or complex problems and offers solutions. Collaboration/Teamwork Effective oral and written skills. Interacts with internal contacts pertaining to specific assignments or meetings. Shows potential; possessing an understanding that influencing/persuasion is a development area for future growth. Innovation Analyses impact of ideas and solutions; applying initiative and creativity to their work. Displays ability to analyse impact of their ideas. Seeks out different ways to accomplish tasks. Integrity Has basic knowledge and understanding of the behaviours and principles that guide desired actions. Provides timely, quality decisions within standard parameters and procedures, with minimal support. Is open and honest about mistakes; learns from experience and delivers improved results. Analytical Thinking Technically astute and familiar with technology. Works in a logical and methodical manner. Uses trusted/known methods to find effective solutions; seeks input as needed. Can solve simple/moderate problems in sphere of work. Strives to take ownership of a problem to find effective solutions; often relies on assistance to help find alternative/adequate solutions. Tends to focus on the first/safest method to solve a problem quickly. Personal Development Understands how own work contributes toward company objectives and readily accepts additional projects/tasks. Effectively balances/prioritises workload to achieve goals. Learns from mistakes. Embraces change; accepting of new ideas, methods, ways of work. GLORY SPIRITSThe Glory Spirits \& Behaviours reflect the values and behaviours that are critical to the ongoing success of Glory and as such represent the foundations of our behaviour globally to lead us to realise our mission: Value Creation \- strive to create value for customers Self\-Starter \- understand the objectives of your own work and are proactive in achieving goals Collaboration \- respect diversity and create a culture of collaboration to work with each other to achieve a common goal Integrity \- understand Glorys mission and act with responsibility and pride to realise achievement and act and behave with high integrity and a strong sense of ethics Own Growth \- leverage our own talent and achieve personal development by adopting a broader perspective; looking beyond our own work. Equal Opportunities Glory believes in equal opportunity for all qualified persons and will not discriminate against any applicant for employment because of race, colour, religion, marital status, national origin, gender, age, disability, veteran status, or any other status protected by law.

title: Applied Scientist
description:
About Oracle and OHAI


Building off our Cloud momentum, Oracle has formed a new organization \- Oracle Health \& AI. This team will focus on product development and product strategy for Oracle Health, while building out a complete platform supporting modernized, automated healthcare. This is a net new line of business, constructed with an entrepreneurial spirit that promotes an energetic and creative environment. We are unencumbered and will need your contribution to make it a world class engineering center with the focus on excellence.


About ODA


Within the larger Oracle Health \& AI organization, the Oracle Digital Assistant (ODA) is an Assistant platform that enables developers to create their own skills and digital assistants using the Conversational AI and Generative AI capabilities exposed to them in a low\-code paradigm. The ODA team has been powering conversational AI experiences for all internal Oracle teams and several external customers for the past 7 years and is evolving rapidly to provide Generative AI solutions for the healthcare and enterprise domains. We operate in an agile environment with a substantial charter, high visibility, and support from senior leadership.


About the team


We are looking for ML scientists, Data Engineers, Software Development Engineers, Product/Program Managers and ML engineers with a strong background in machine learning to build industry\-leading solutions. You will work with huge volumes of data to solve/enable solving real\-world problems in the Healthcare domain that are productionized into our Health AI products. Your solutions will be productized as features in the end products. These are new teams that we are putting together in India Center from scratch and the work will span across New Feature Development for CDA Specialty Expansion \& Innovation, Language \& Region Expansion, Software Development across front\-end, back\-end, test automation and mobile, ML Engineering, MLOps, LLMOps, Applied ML Sciences and ML Research, with a huge focus on GenAI capabilities. There is a huge emphasis on Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI. Your contributions will be pivotal in delivering our new Generative AI\-powered solutions for healthcare and enterprise customers.  



Qualifications


* Ph.D. Degree preferred.
* Experience having led multiple projects leveraging LLMs, GenAI and Prompt Engineering Exposure to real\-world MLOps deploying models into production adding features to products
* Knowledge of working in a cloud environment
* 5\+ Years of Experience
* Strong understanding of LLMs, GenAI, Prompt Engineering and Copilot

Career Level \- IC4


  
Responsibilities


* Strong expertise in Python programming and one of the Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch, MXNet, TensorFlow, Keras) and understanding of LLMs, LLMOps and Generative AI \- to be able to deliver per specifications; complete assignments without assistance by exercising judgment \& appropriate actions
* Knowledge of Classification, Prediction, Recommender Systems, Time Series Forecasting, Anomaly Detection, Optimization, Graph ML, NLP. Hands\-on develop ML models using the above techniques
* Ability to both use existing libraries (ML, Deep Learning, Re\-inforcement Learning) as well as design algorithms ground\-up; Able to prepare data pipelines and feature engineering pipelines to build robust models
* Combine ML Sciences depth, programming expertise and mathematical understanding of techniques to deliver state\-of\-the\-art ML solutions for problem solving across Healthcare domain
* Drives selection of methods and techniques to drive solutions
* Demonstrate strong program management to be able to multi\-task effectively
* Be able to mentor \& lead junior data scientists effectively
* Contribute to peer reviews, team learning, meeting product objectives and develop best practices for the organization
* Strong research record preferred demonstrated, through publications
* Scientific thinking and ability to invent: Prior experience creating intellectual property through patents desirable
* Identify and investigate new technologies, prototype and test solutions for product features and design/validate patterns that deliver a compelling experience
* Take responsibility for technical problem solving to meet product objectives and develop best practices
* Ability to resolve complex business problems in creative and effective ways
* Strong experience in LLM Systems and LLMOps. Prior experience with Prompt Engineering and RAG systems
company_description: Oracle is the cloud leader for global business. Our technologies are transforming the world and no matter how complex, they have one thing in common: making our shared future better.

title: Senior Pre-Sales Engineer (India - Remote)
description:
**Job description**

**Company Overview:**

Mapsted (www.mapsted.com) is a global leader in innovative location\-based technology, distinguished by its proprietary hardware\-free solutions. Founded in 2014, the company has pioneered the transformation of data chaos into actionable intelligence through advanced AI and machine learning. Mapsted has meticulously mapped over one billion square feet of indoor space and holds more than 100 patents, showcasing its commitment to trailblazing innovation. Its unique ability to deliver scalable, beacon\-free indoor positioning with an accuracy of 1â€“5 meters places it at the forefront of the industry.

**Job Summary:**

The Senior Pre\-Sales Engineer will play a critical role in driving technical sales efforts by working closely with enterprise customers, sales teams, and partners in the UK \& EMEA region. This role requires deep technical expertise, strong solution\-selling skills, and the ability to engage with clients to demonstrate and position complex solutions. The ideal candidate will bridge the gap between technical solutions and business needs, supporting the sales cycle from initial discovery to closing deals.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**1\. Technical Sales Support \& Solution Design**

* Collaborate with sales teams to understand customer requirements and propose tailored solutions.
* Conduct product demonstrations, proof\-of\-concept (PoC) engagements, and technical deep\-dives for prospective clients.
* Provide pre\-sales technical support by addressing product\-related queries and advising on deployment strategies.
* Design and recommend architecture and integration solutions based on customer needs and industry best practices.

**2\. Customer Engagement \& Technical Consultations**

* Act as a trusted technical advisor to customers, ensuring solutions align with their business challenges and IT environments.
* Lead technical discovery sessions to gather and analyze customer pain points and translate them into actionable solutions.
* Deliver customer presentations, webinars, and workshops to showcase technical capabilities.
* Assist in developing RFP (Request for Proposal) responses and technical documentation.

**3\. Collaboration with Internal \& External Stakeholders**

* Work closely with Sales, Product Management, and Engineering teams to align solutions with customer expectations.
* Support channel partners, system integrators, and resellers in positioning and selling solutions.
* Provide feedback to the product development team based on customer requirements and market trends.

**4\. Competitive Analysis \& Market Intelligence**

* Stay updated on industry trends, competitors, and emerging technologies to position offerings effectively.
* Conduct competitive analysis and benchmarking to highlight product differentiators.
* Provide insights to sales and marketing teams to refine go\-to\-market strategies.

**5\. Technical Enablement \& Training**

* Assist in training sales teams, partners, and customers on product capabilities and technical use cases.
* Develop technical content, whitepapers, FAQs, and best practice guides to enhance knowledge sharing.
* Participate in industry conferences, events, and trade shows to represent the company and engage with prospects.

**Qualifications \& Requirements:**

* 7\+ years in pre\-sales engineering, solutions architecture, or technical consulting in a B2B enterprise environment.
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, or related fields (or equivalent experience).
* Strong expertise in solution design, cloud architectures (AWS, Azure, GCP), networking, and security.
* Proficiency in API integrations, SaaS, and enterprise software deployments.
* Exceptional communication, presentation, and stakeholder management skills.
* Ability to translate technical concepts into business value for customers.
* Strong problem\-solving and consultative sales approach.
* Comfortable working in fast\-paced, high\-growth environments.

Job Type: Full\-time

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday

Work Location: Remote
company_addresses: Mapstedâ€™s headquarters in Oakville, Canada, serves as the heart of its operations, with a dynamic global presence spanning all major countries, driving innovation and excellence worldwide.

title: Project Manager Execution - Interior Design
description:
Position \- Project Manager \- Interior Execution

Location \- Madhapur

**Job Summary**

Seeking a Project Manager \- Interior Executions to deliver high\-quality projects on time and within budget. The ideal candidate will lead cross\-functional teams, manage timelines and resources, ensure client satisfaction, and maintain compliance with building codes and regulations.

**Job Responsibilities**

Project Planning and Coordination: Develop project plans, including timelines, budgets, and resource allocation. Coordinate with clients, designers, and contractors to align on project goals.

Budget Management: Monitor project budgets, control costs, and ensure that expenditures are within the allocated budget. Prepare cost estimates and track expenses.

Team Leadership: Lead and manage project teams, including interior designers, architects, and subcontractors. Assign tasks and responsibilities to ensure efficient workflow.

Client Communication: Act as the primary point of contact for clients, addressing their needs and concerns throughout the project lifecycle. Provide regular updates on project status and progress.

Quality Control: Ensure that the work meets the required quality standards and design specifications. Conduct regular site visits to monitor progress and resolve any issues.

Schedule Management: Develop and maintain project schedules, ensuring that tasks are completed on time. Adjust schedules as needed to accommodate changes or delays.

Procurement: Oversee the procurement of materials, furniture, and fixtures needed for the project. Establish relationships with suppliers and negotiate contracts.

Risk Management: Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize their impact on the project.

Documentation: Maintain accurate project documentation, including contracts, change orders, and meeting notes. Ensure that all necessary permits and approvals are obtained.

Final Inspection and Handover: Conduct final inspections to ensure all work is completed to satisfaction. Coordinate the handover process to the client, including providing necessary documentation and warranties.

Skills \& Qualifications:

A bachelor's degree in interior design, architecture, construction management, or a related field is often required.

Minimum 7\+ years of experience in project management, interior design, or construction. Experience managing interior execution projects is highly desirable.

Exceptional organizational skills to manage multiple tasks, timelines, and priorities efficiently.

Ability to identify issues and develop effective solutions to keep projects on track.

Strong negotiation skills to work with clients, contractors, and suppliers on contracts, timelines, and costs.

Ability to manage budgets and finullcial aspects of projects effectively.

Professional certifications such as Project Management Professional (PMP) or Certified Interior Designer (CID) can be advantageous.

Familiarity with project management software (e.g., Microsoft Project, Trello, Asana) and design software (e.g., AutoCAD, SketchUp, Revit).

Understanding local building codes, regulations, and safety standards relevant to interior construction and design.

Personal Attributes:

Integrity and strong ethical standards.

Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.

A proactive approach to problem\-solving and decision\-making.

**About Aakriti Indesign Studio**

We are one of the best rated architectural and interior design firm based in the Hyderabad, India.

We have delivered a number of creative interiors for Commercial, Office, Retail, Landscaping, Clubs and Residential space from design concept to handover with immense growth potential and creating tomorrows leaders.

We are a multicultural team of passionate individuals dedicated to delivering a unique project. This is always achieved through a tailored approach, reflecting the clients needs and aspirations. We work hand in hand with a network of trusted worldwide partners in order to accommodate the most varied and complex projects. Our interiors are focused on flexibility and functionality without compromising on style and design.

Our approach is to create the most suitable designs with assorted architectural features and subtle touches and refinement; a vision of elegance expressed with sensibility and care in every detail.

We are promoted by Aakriti Housing, one of the reputed companies engaged in the business of construction. Aakriti Housing has delivered more than 20\+ lacs SQFT of space across 10\+ Gated Community projects with another 40\+ lac SQFT in ongoing/upcoming projects.

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: â‚¹50,000\.00 \- â‚¹100,000\.00 per month

Schedule:

* Day shift
* Morning shift

Work Location: In person

title: MEP Engineer
description:
About Us:

Clayworks is a dynamic and innovative player in the commercial real estate cum hospitality sector, committed to delivering unparalleled experiences to our clients. With a focus on creating exceptional spaces and providing top\-notch service, we are seeking an MEP Engineer to join our team. Mapsted has meticulously mapped over one billion square feet of indoor space and holds more than 100 patents, showcasing its commitment to trailblazing innovation. This role requires deep technical expertise, strong solution\-selling skills, and the ability to engage with clients to demonstrate and position complex solutions. **4\. Competitive Analysis \& Market Intelligence**

**5\. Technical Enablement \& Training**

* Assist in training sales teams, partners, and customers on product capabilities and technical use cases.
* Develop technical content, whitepapers, FAQs, and best practice guides to enhance knowledge sharing.
* Participate in industry conferences, events, and trade shows to represent the company and engage with prospects.

**Qualifications \& Requirements:**

title: Applied Scientist
description:
About Oracle and OHAI


Building off our Cloud momentum, Oracle has formed a new organization \- Oracle Health \& AI. This team will focus on product development and product strategy for Oracle Health, while building out a complete platform supporting modernized, automated healthcare. This is a net new line of business, constructed with an entrepreneurial spirit that promotes an energetic and creative environment. We are unencumbered and will need your contribution to make it a world class engineering center with the focus on excellence.


About ODA


Within the larger Oracle Health \& AI organization, the Oracle Digital Assistant (ODA) is an Assistant platform that enables developers to create their own skills and digital assistants using the Conversational AI and Generative AI capabilities exposed to them in a low\-code paradigm. The ODA team has been powering conversational AI experiences for all internal Oracle teams and several external customers for the past 7 years and is evolving rapidly to provide Generative AI solutions for the healthcare and enterprise domains. We operate in an agile environment with a substantial charter, high visibility, and support from senior leadership.


About the team


We are looking for ML scientists, Data Engineers, Software Development Engineers, Product/Program Managers and ML engineers with a strong background in machine learning to build industry\-leading solutions. You will work with huge volumes of data to solve/enable solving real\-world problems in the Healthcare domain that are productionized into our Health AI products. Your solutions will be productized as features in the end products. These are new teams that we are putting together in India Center from scratch and the work will span across New Feature Development for CDA Specialty Expansion \& Innovation, Language \& Region Expansion, Software Development across front\-end, back\-end, test automation and mobile, ML Engineering, MLOps, LLMOps, Applied ML Sciences and ML Research, with a huge focus on GenAI capabilities. There is a huge emphasis on Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI. Your contributions will be pivotal in delivering our new Generative AI\-powered solutions for healthcare and enterprise customers.  



Qualifications


* Ph.D. Degree preferred.
* Experience having led multiple projects leveraging LLMs, GenAI and Prompt Engineering Exposure to real\-world MLOps deploying models into production adding features to products
* Knowledge of working in a cloud environment
* 5\+ Years of Experience
* Strong understanding of LLMs, GenAI, Prompt Engineering and Copilot

Career Level \- IC4


  
Responsibilities


* Strong expertise in Python programming and one of the Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch, MXNet, TensorFlow, Keras) and understanding of LLMs, LLMOps and Generative AI \- to be able to deliver per specifications; complete assignments without assistance by exercising judgment \& appropriate actions
* Knowledge of Classification, Prediction, Recommender Systems, Time Series Forecasting, Anomaly Detection, Optimization, Graph ML, NLP. Hands\-on develop ML models using the above techniques
* Ability to both use existing libraries (ML, Deep Learning, Re\-inforcement Learning) as well as design algorithms ground\-up; Able to prepare data pipelines and feature engineering pipelines to build robust models
* Combine ML Sciences depth, programming expertise and mathematical understanding of techniques to deliver state\-of\-the\-art ML solutions for problem solving across Healthcare domain
* Drives selection of methods and techniques to drive solutions
* Demonstrate strong program management to be able to multi\-task effectively
* Be able to mentor \& lead junior data scientists effectively
* Contribute to peer reviews, team learning, meeting product objectives and develop best practices for the organization
* Strong research record preferred demonstrated, through publications
* Scientific thinking and ability to invent: Prior experience creating intellectual property through patents desirable
* Identify and investigate new technologies, prototype and test solutions for product features and design/validate patterns that deliver a compelling experience
* Take responsibility for technical problem solving to meet product objectives and develop best practices
* Ability to resolve complex business problems in creative and effective ways
* Strong experience in LLM Systems and LLMOps. Prior experience with Prompt Engineering and RAG systems

* A custodian of huge company assets, complex operations and handling of large 3PL workforce (40\+)
  
  

**Key Result Areas/Accountabilities**

  

This position is an active enabler in the following key deliverables\-


* Support Huge network roll out and help telecom network modernization as per business plan
* Efficient SCM of tradable (distribution) to support Revenue generation (Kitting to Delivery). No stock outs can be afforded in the trade, in full delivery of POP and Merchandising items to enhance brand visibility

**Warehousing\-**


The role requires handling of end to end warehouse management of multiple warehouse(s) in the cluster for Network, Opex (SIMs), Marcom (PoS etc.). The role has to cater to important deliverables by maintaining minimum cost, high efficiency, safety and 100% compliance to HSW


* **Managing huge Network roll\-out, swap activity, consolidation of network, huge SRN transactions and scrap disposals**
* **Maintain strict inventory controls and minimum Warehouse Residency to ensure high Inventory Turnover Ratio (ITR).**
* **Handle multiple local transporters (sometimes politically influenced) and local unions to ensure optimum \& timely availability of HSW compliant vehicles for network roll\-out**
* **Most of the workforce (going upto 50\+ numbers per Circle) is less educated (low skilled and/or semi\-skilled labours), still the position needs to support timely network roll out and efficient tradable supply chain.**
* **Continuous engagement of Drivers, labourers through Trainings, team development \& motivation**
* **Often serves calls beyond duty due to business urgencies from user functions**
* **Warehouse operations for minimum 6 days a week (and sometimes even on Sundays to meet the business requirement) â€“ almost 12\-14 hours a day**
* **Space Management (manage more in less)**
* **Ensure appropriate stock of SIMs to support business growth**
* **Short notice from Sales team to organize Sim Kitting and dispatches of Tradable (which are the main source of revenue)**
* **GST compliance for stock transfer, market dispatches, reverse logistics, SRN, Swap and Scrap**
* Most importantly this position manages the physical area, assets, labours, 3 PLs on ground and all the time supports business growth.
* Interacts with senior team members of network, marketing, sales and retail functions to coordinate and manage warehousing and logistics

**Inventory Controls\-**


* Tracking warehouse performance KPIs \& improvement plans
* Provide visibility of inventory to user teams for effective deployment and monitoring in cluster
* Coordinate with Network \& SSC for operations and reconciliation aspects of NSS (Network Stock Solution)
* Manage reporting, compliances and interface for auditors and ensuring any supporting required for audit and any issues are addressed in timely manner
* Conduct internal audits to assure VIL processes and standards, pertaining to Good Receipt (GRN)/ Goods Issue (GI)/ Compliance / HSW etc.

**Logistics\-**


* Managing the primary logistics in close coordination with the category manager in commercial (i.e., movement of materials from vendor factories, import ports to multiple warehouse in the cluster) at minimum costs
* Ensuring timely availability of HSW compliant vehicles \& drivers to ship network equipment from warehouse(s) to sites and thereafter return of swap/switched\-off equipmentâ€™s packed (in good condition) back to warehouse from sites
* Transportation Efficiency \- Optimize the secondary transportation routes, loads and frequency and thereby reduce the overall transportation spend
* Route planning and monitoring material movement to multiple sites and other clusters
* Movement of tradable i.e., SIM/POP to distributors, retailers and other zonal locations through a team of couriers
* Co\-ordinate with TPL vendors and validation of their performance and invoices
* Driving and Implementation of Intelligent Transport \& Courier Management System (ITCMS) to ensure greater controls, compliances and keep a check \& tight control on logistics cost

**Warehouse Safety, Security \& Audits\-**


* Ensure 5S in warehouse
* Drive safety initiatives \& awareness programs in warehouse
* Compliance to Record keeping
* Routine audits
* Stock count, Monthly reconciliation
* Any other audits being recommended from time to time

**Health Safety Well\-being (HSW) Warehouse Management\-**


* Ensuring HSW compliance in Warehouse
* Conduct Monthly Audits at Warehouse
* Ensure 100% vehicle and driver inspection
* Training â€“ in\-house and to contractors/drivers
  
  

**Core Competencies, Knowledge, Experience**

  

* High level of Integrity, ethics and other value systems
* Strong Knowledge and understanding of Supply Chain management (Warehousing \& Logistics)
* Ability to manage multiple senior stake holders/Vertical Heads
* Excellent coordination skills and ability to deal with transporters, unions \& uneducated labourers
* Ability to work long hours and in extreme weather conditions (in warehouse) and emergency situations
* Good communication, presentation, excel skills, MIS, and experience on ERP
  
  

**Technical / professional qualifications**

  

* BE preferably with MBA
Background in Warehousing, Logistics and Supply Chain  
* 
  

**Years of Experience**

  

7\-15 years

title: Applied Scientist
description:
About Oracle and OHAI


Building off our Cloud momentum, Oracle has formed a new organization \- Oracle Health \& AI. This team will focus on product development and product strategy for Oracle Health, while building out a complete platform supporting modernized, automated healthcare. This is a net new line of business, constructed with an entrepreneurial spirit that promotes an energetic and creative environment. We are unencumbered and will need your contribution to make it a world class engineering center with the focus on excellence.


About ODA


Within the larger Oracle Health \& AI organization, the Oracle Digital Assistant (ODA) is an Assistant platform that enables developers to create their own skills and digital assistants using the Conversational AI and Generative AI capabilities exposed to them in a low\-code paradigm. The ODA team has been powering conversational AI experiences for all internal Oracle teams and several external customers for the past 7 years and is evolving rapidly to provide Generative AI solutions for the healthcare and enterprise domains. We operate in an agile environment with a substantial charter, high visibility, and support from senior leadership.


About the team


We are looking for ML scientists, Data Engineers, Software Development Engineers, Product/Program Managers and ML engineers with a strong background in machine learning to build industry\-leading solutions. You will work with huge volumes of data to solve/enable solving real\-world problems in the Healthcare domain that are productionized into our Health AI products. Your solutions will be productized as features in the end products. These are new teams that we are putting together in India Center from scratch and the work will span across New Feature Development for CDA Specialty Expansion \& Innovation, Language \& Region Expansion, Software Development across front\-end, back\-end, test automation and mobile, ML Engineering, MLOps, LLMOps, Applied ML Sciences and ML Research, with a huge focus on GenAI capabilities. There is a huge emphasis on Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI. Your contributions will be pivotal in delivering our new Generative AI\-powered solutions for healthcare and enterprise customers.  



Qualifications


* Ph.D. Degree preferred.
* Experience having led multiple projects leveraging LLMs, GenAI and Prompt Engineering Exposure to real\-world MLOps deploying models into production adding features to products
* Knowledge of working in a cloud environment
* 5\+ Years of Experience
* Strong understanding of LLMs, GenAI, Prompt Engineering and Copilot

Career Level \- IC4


  
Responsibilities


* Strong expertise in Python programming and one of the Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch, MXNet, TensorFlow, Keras) and understanding of LLMs, LLMOps and Generative AI \- to be able to deliver per specifications; complete assignments without assistance by exercising judgment \& appropriate actions
* Knowledge of Classification, Prediction, Recommender Systems, Time Series Forecasting, Anomaly Detection, Optimization, Graph ML, NLP. Hands\-on develop ML models using the above techniques
* Ability to both use existing libraries (ML, Deep Learning, Re\-inforcement Learning) as well as design algorithms ground\-up; Able to prepare data pipelines and feature engineering pipelines to build robust models
* Combine ML Sciences depth, programming expertise and mathematical understanding of techniques to deliver state\-of\-the\-art ML solutions for problem solving across Healthcare domain
* Drives selection of methods and techniques to drive solutions
* Demonstrate strong program management to be able to multi\-task effectively
* Be able to mentor \& lead junior data scientists effectively
* Contribute to peer reviews, team learning, meeting product objectives and develop best practices for the organization
* Strong research record preferred demonstrated, through publications
* Scientific thinking and ability to invent: Prior experience creating intellectual property through patents desirable
* Identify and investigate new technologies, prototype and test solutions for product features and design/validate patterns that deliver a compelling experience
* Take responsibility for technical problem solving to meet product objectives and develop best practices
* Ability to resolve complex business problems in creative and effective ways
* Strong experience in LLM Systems and LLMOps. Prior experience with Prompt Engineering and RAG systems

title: Electrical Supervisor
description:
**Job Title:** Electrical Supervisor

**Company:** Shree Sabhari Engineers

**Location:** Coimbatore, India

**About Us:**

Shree Sabhari Engineers has been a trusted name in manufacturing material handling solutions for over 25 years. We specialize in EOT Cranes, Monorail Cranes, Gantry Cranes, and Industrial Goods Lifts.

**Job Description:** We are looking for an experienced Electrical Supervisor to join our team. The primary responsibilities include Control Panel board wiring, Crane wiring, and providing Crane\-related services. This is a fieldwork position requiring hands\-on expertise and the ability to work in various environments.

* Oversee and perform Control Panel board wiring for EOT cranes.

* Conduct regular inspections and testing of electrical systems to identify and resolve issues promptly.
* Maintain accurate records of work performed, including wiring diagrams, service reports, and maintenullce logs.
* Ensure compliance with all safety regulations and company policies.
* Train and mentor junior staff, providing guidance and support to develop their skills.

**Qualifications:**

* Diploma or degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field.
* Proven experience as an Electrical Supervisor or similar role in the manufacturing or crane industry.
* Strong knowledge of electrical systems, control panel board wiring, and crane wiring.
* Excellent troubleshooting and problem\-solving skills.
* Ability to read and interpret electrical schematics and blueprints.
* Good leadership and team management skills.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
* Willingness to travel and work on\-site as required.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* Supportive and collaborative work environment.
* Exposure to a variety of challenging and rewarding projects.

 **Key Roles and Responsibilities:** Typical tasks may include, but are not limited to, the following:

* **Technical Issue Resolution:** Diagnose and resolve hardware, software, and network problems efficiently.
* **System and Code Management:** Ensure secure, accurate migration and management of production code assets.
* **Documentation and Standards:** Document problems, enforce standards, and consult on compliance with development teams.
* **Process Improvement:** Analyze performance and implement processes for enhanced efficiency and effectiveness.
* **User and Team Support:** Provide technical support, training, and communication to users and IT staff.

 **Job Contribution:**

* An experienced professional with foundational knowledge, applying company policies to routine issues. Follows standard procedures to analyze data and perform transactional work. Contributes to project fulfillment and organizational objectives, influencing productivity and expenditures. Works under regular supervision with visibility primarily within the department or region.

**Supervisor:** No  

  

**Education/Experience:**

* Bachelorâ€™s degree (BS/BA) desired.
* 3\-5 years of relevant experience.

**Roles and Responsibilities:**

* Acting as a Tier T1\.5 for GCSC Teams.
* 1st responders supporting AT\&T GCSC strategic services like Flexware, SDWAN OTT
* Expertise in performing network triage and problem determination
* Knowledge of different types of transport/Circuits \-AVPN, AIA, BB, LTE
* Managing the process of Service restoration and break/fix functions, Scope include â€“ Analyze and escalate
* Prioritizing and analyzing the events in the network devices
* Engage right group for software or hardware resources when unavailable or when there is degradation in performance impacting business processes.
* Ensure monitoring, data capture, and analysis capabilities to quickly identify problem areas and provide corrective action.

**Ticket Management:**

* Work with internal support groups and recommend diagnostic tests based on degree of service impairment
* Access provider management and associated escalations
* Coordinate with other support centers (i.e. external organizations and internal and external business partners) for resolving the incident tickets.
* Escalate ticket according to process based on the established intervals.

**Technical Skills:**

* Minimum 3\-5 years of relevant experience in telecommunications \& managed network infrastructure industry
* No less than 3 years of working experience, preferably on customer services interfacing with clients.
* No less than 3\-5 years of hands\-on experience on Networking / IT infrastructure as an engineer (any of the one listed â€“ WAN, LAN, Voice, IT infrastructure, Hosting, Servers, Firewall, NOC etc.)
* Knowledge on SDN/SDWAN â€“ Viptela, Velocloud, Silverpeak or 128T
* Good knowledge of WAN, LAN \& Voice technologies to manage the IT operations
* Good knowledge on various Router, Switches. Firewalls, Wireless technology, Access Points, WAN Circuits, SD WAN, Call manager, gateway etc.
* Strong understanding of Voice, Data and IP networks is required.

**Professional Skills:**

* Excellent communication skills (verbal \& written, technical \& interpersonal)
* Excellent telephone manner
* Excellent problem\-solving skills
* Professionalism at all times
* Highly skilled in the use of PC systems and applications
* Ability to work well under pressure, set priorities and make well\-considered decisions
* Drive, enthusiasm, initiative, commitment and self\-motivation
* Resourcefulness and flexibility
* Ability to work well in a team
