title: Software Engineer (Associate)
description:
### **Description**

  

ROLE TITLE: Associate Software Engineer (Java / .Net) ECF LEVEL: L2 FUNCTION: IBHQ \- DQO REGION: New Business Development Division / India Software Development Centre REPORTING: General Manager LOCATION: Hyderabad, India COMPANY OVERVIEW As a global leader in cash technology solutions, we provide the finullcial, retail, cash centre and gaming industries with confidence that their cash is protected and always working to help build a stronger business. Our cash automation technologies and process engineering services help businesses in more than 100 countries optimise the handling, movement and management of cash. While we span the globe, we personally engage with each customer to address their unique challenges and goals enhancing staff efficiency, reducing operating costs and enabling a more rewarding customer experience. We offer peace of mind. We enable transformation. We generate options. We empower people. We do all this by releasing companies from the burden of cash management, putting cash to work, and helping customers enhance the value that their staff and facilities add to their business. We pride ourselves on customer focus, solution quality and our great team. We are growing and diversifying and are looking for talented people who are passionate about what they do and want to contribute to the next phase in our companys success. ROLE PURPOSE Located in the heart of Hyderabad in a modern high\-tech office setting, we have vacancies for Associate level .Net \& Java engineers to join our team and support software development, covering all aspects of development, testing and implementation of Glory products. MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES Writing \& debugging code Troubleshooting software issues Working closely with Hyderabad Team to improve product software functionality Attending software meetings / code reviews and QA activities Continually improving coding skills EDUCATION, QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE B.E., B.Tech., M.Sc., MCA Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field. Minimum 3 years progressive working experience English speaking (including written/oral) and must be able to confidently communicate with different audiences within the company (requirement is essential). Technical Skills Required \- Java Engineer Tech stack : Angular / Spring Boot / Rest API / SQL Server Must have skills: Excellent programming skills in Java / JavaScript. Programming skill in AngularTS. Administration and configuration of Java Enterprise Application Server (Tomcat, JBoss, WebSphere). Programming with SQL databases (Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle). RestAPI programming. Solid understanding of network security protocols. Reporting engines \- Jasper Reports. Able to trouble shoot IT issues at an enterprise level. Understands customer issues presented in a non\-technical way, and to find their technical root cause. Experience in load tests using Junit test cases. Technical Skills Required \- .Net Engineer Tech stack: .Net (Dot Net framework) / ASP.Net / SOAP Web services / SQL Server Must have skills: Programming language: C\# (UI), C\+\+, .Net Core, ASP.Net SOAP webservice with axis2c, Apache web server, NginX web server Programming with SQL databases (Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle). RestAPI programming. Solid understanding of network security protocols. Able to troubleshoot IT issues at an enterprise level Understands customer issues presented in a non\-technical way, and to find their technical root cause. REQUIRED COMPETENCIES TO BE SUCCESSFUL AS A SOFTWARE ENGINEER INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING: General Characteristics Understands how own work contributes toward company objectives. Prioritises own workload to achieve key milestones. Learns from mistakes. Embraces change; accepting of new ideas, methods and ways of working. Technical Ability Able to function in a team environment. Applies learning to improve knowledge and develop/build technical expertise. Performs at a basic level; is competent and absorbs Managerial Accountability No managerial responsibility required at this level. Achieving High Performance Regularly monitored and receives some level of supervision in day\-to\-day work. Receives direction on unconventional and/or complex problems and offers solutions. Collaboration/Teamwork Effective oral and written skills. Interacts with internal contacts pertaining to specific assignments or meetings. Shows potential; possessing an understanding that influencing/persuasion is a development area for future growth. Innovation Analyses impact of ideas and solutions; applying initiative and creativity to their work. Displays ability to analyse impact of their ideas. Seeks out different ways to accomplish tasks. Integrity Has basic knowledge and understanding of the behaviours and principles that guide desired actions. Provides timely, quality decisions within standard parameters and procedures, with minimal support. Is open and honest about mistakes; learns from experience and delivers improved results. Analytical Thinking Technically astute and familiar with technology. Works in a logical and methodical manner. Uses trusted/known methods to find effective solutions; seeks input as needed. Can solve simple/moderate problems in sphere of work. Strives to take ownership of a problem to find effective solutions; often relies on assistance to help find alternative/adequate solutions. Tends to focus on the first/safest method to solve a problem quickly. Personal Development Understands how own work contributes toward company objectives and readily accepts additional projects/tasks. Effectively balances/prioritises workload to achieve goals. Learns from mistakes. Embraces change; accepting of new ideas, methods, ways of work. GLORY SPIRITSThe Glory Spirits \& Behaviours reflect the values and behaviours that are critical to the ongoing success of Glory and as such represent the foundations of our behaviour globally to lead us to realise our mission: Value Creation \- strive to create value for customers Self\-Starter \- understand the objectives of your own work and are proactive in achieving goals Collaboration \- respect diversity and create a culture of collaboration to work with each other to achieve a common goal Integrity \- understand Glorys mission and act with responsibility and pride to realise achievement and act and behave with high integrity and a strong sense of ethics Own Growth \- leverage our own talent and achieve personal development by adopting a broader perspective; looking beyond our own work. Equal Opportunities Glory believes in equal opportunity for all qualified persons and will not discriminate against any applicant for employment because of race, colour, religion, marital status, national origin, gender, age, disability, veteran status, or any other status protected by law.

title: Applied Scientist
description:
About Oracle and OHAI


Building off our Cloud momentum, Oracle has formed a new organization \- Oracle Health \& AI. This team will focus on product development and product strategy for Oracle Health, while building out a complete platform supporting modernized, automated healthcare. This is a net new line of business, constructed with an entrepreneurial spirit that promotes an energetic and creative environment. We are unencumbered and will need your contribution to make it a world class engineering center with the focus on excellence.


About ODA


Within the larger Oracle Health \& AI organization, the Oracle Digital Assistant (ODA) is an Assistant platform that enables developers to create their own skills and digital assistants using the Conversational AI and Generative AI capabilities exposed to them in a low\-code paradigm. The ODA team has been powering conversational AI experiences for all internal Oracle teams and several external customers for the past 7 years and is evolving rapidly to provide Generative AI solutions for the healthcare and enterprise domains. We operate in an agile environment with a substantial charter, high visibility, and support from senior leadership.


About the team


We are looking for ML scientists, Data Engineers, Software Development Engineers, Product/Program Managers and ML engineers with a strong background in machine learning to build industry\-leading solutions. You will work with huge volumes of data to solve/enable solving real\-world problems in the Healthcare domain that are productionized into our Health AI products. Your solutions will be productized as features in the end products. These are new teams that we are putting together in India Center from scratch and the work will span across New Feature Development for CDA Specialty Expansion \& Innovation, Language \& Region Expansion, Software Development across front\-end, back\-end, test automation and mobile, ML Engineering, MLOps, LLMOps, Applied ML Sciences and ML Research, with a huge focus on GenAI capabilities. There is a huge emphasis on Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI. Your contributions will be pivotal in delivering our new Generative AI\-powered solutions for healthcare and enterprise customers.  



Qualifications


* Ph.D. Degree preferred.
* Experience having led multiple projects leveraging LLMs, GenAI and Prompt Engineering Exposure to real\-world MLOps deploying models into production adding features to products
* Knowledge of working in a cloud environment
* 5\+ Years of Experience
* Strong understanding of LLMs, GenAI, Prompt Engineering and Copilot

Career Level \- IC4


  
Responsibilities


* Strong expertise in Python programming and one of the Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch, MXNet, TensorFlow, Keras) and understanding of LLMs, LLMOps and Generative AI \- to be able to deliver per specifications; complete assignments without assistance by exercising judgment \& appropriate actions
* Knowledge of Classification, Prediction, Recommender Systems, Time Series Forecasting, Anomaly Detection, Optimization, Graph ML, NLP. Hands\-on develop ML models using the above techniques
* Ability to both use existing libraries (ML, Deep Learning, Re\-inforcement Learning) as well as design algorithms ground\-up; Able to prepare data pipelines and feature engineering pipelines to build robust models
* Combine ML Sciences depth, programming expertise and mathematical understanding of techniques to deliver state\-of\-the\-art ML solutions for problem solving across Healthcare domain
* Drives selection of methods and techniques to drive solutions
* Demonstrate strong program management to be able to multi\-task effectively
* Be able to mentor \& lead junior data scientists effectively
* Contribute to peer reviews, team learning, meeting product objectives and develop best practices for the organization
* Strong research record preferred demonstrated, through publications
* Scientific thinking and ability to invent: Prior experience creating intellectual property through patents desirable
* Identify and investigate new technologies, prototype and test solutions for product features and design/validate patterns that deliver a compelling experience
* Take responsibility for technical problem solving to meet product objectives and develop best practices
* Ability to resolve complex business problems in creative and effective ways
* Strong experience in LLM Systems and LLMOps. Prior experience with Prompt Engineering and RAG systems

title: Senior Pre-Sales Engineer (India - Remote)
description:
**Job description**

**Company Overview:**

Mapsted (www.mapsted.com) is a global leader in innovative location\-based technology, distinguished by its proprietary hardware\-free solutions. Founded in 2014, the company has pioneered the transformation of data chaos into actionable intelligence through advanced AI and machine learning. Mapsted has meticulously mapped over one billion square feet of indoor space and holds more than 100 patents, showcasing its commitment to trailblazing innovation. Its unique ability to deliver scalable, beacon\-free indoor positioning with an accuracy of 1â€“5 meters places it at the forefront of the industry.

**Job Summary:**

The Senior Pre\-Sales Engineer will play a critical role in driving technical sales efforts by working closely with enterprise customers, sales teams, and partners in the UK \& EMEA region. This role requires deep technical expertise, strong solution\-selling skills, and the ability to engage with clients to demonstrate and position complex solutions. The ideal candidate will bridge the gap between technical solutions and business needs, supporting the sales cycle from initial discovery to closing deals.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**1\. Technical Sales Support \& Solution Design**

* Collaborate with sales teams to understand customer requirements and propose tailored solutions.
* Conduct product demonstrations, proof\-of\-concept (PoC) engagements, and technical deep\-dives for prospective clients.
* Provide pre\-sales technical support by addressing product\-related queries and advising on deployment strategies.
* Design and recommend architecture and integration solutions based on customer needs and industry best practices.

**2\. Customer Engagement \& Technical Consultations**

* Act as a trusted technical advisor to customers, ensuring solutions align with their business challenges and IT environments.
* Lead technical discovery sessions to gather and analyze customer pain points and translate them into actionable solutions.
* Deliver customer presentations, webinars, and workshops to showcase technical capabilities.
* Assist in developing RFP (Request for Proposal) responses and technical documentation.

**3\. Collaboration with Internal \& External Stakeholders**

* Work closely with Sales, Product Management, and Engineering teams to align solutions with customer expectations.
* Support channel partners, system integrators, and resellers in positioning and selling solutions.
* Provide feedback to the product development team based on customer requirements and market trends.

**4\. Competitive Analysis \& Market Intelligence**

* Stay updated on industry trends, competitors, and emerging technologies to position offerings effectively.
* Conduct competitive analysis and benchmarking to highlight product differentiators.
* Provide insights to sales and marketing teams to refine go\-to\-market strategies.

**5\. Technical Enablement \& Training**

* Assist in training sales teams, partners, and customers on product capabilities and technical use cases.
* Develop technical content, whitepapers, FAQs, and best practice guides to enhance knowledge sharing.
* Participate in industry conferences, events, and trade shows to represent the company and engage with prospects.

**Qualifications \& Requirements:**

* 7\+ years in pre\-sales engineering, solutions architecture, or technical consulting in a B2B enterprise environment.
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, IT, or related fields (or equivalent experience).
* Strong expertise in solution design, cloud architectures (AWS, Azure, GCP), networking, and security.
* Proficiency in API integrations, SaaS, and enterprise software deployments.
* Exceptional communication, presentation, and stakeholder management skills.
* Ability to translate technical concepts into business value for customers.
* Strong problem\-solving and consultative sales approach.
* Comfortable working in fast\-paced, high\-growth environments.

Job Type: Full\-time

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday

Work Location: Remote

title: General Manager - Business Development
description:
**Job Summary:**

**Key Responsibilities:**

**1\. Business Development Strategy \& Execution**

* Develop and implement comprehensive business development strategies to expand market share and revenue.
* Identify potential business opportunities, market trends, and client needs to increase profitability.
* Work closely with senior leadership to align business strategies with company growth objectives.

**2\. Client Relationship Management**

* Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, stakeholders, and industry leaders.
* Lead negotiations and finalize high\-value contracts, ensuring mutually beneficial agreements.
* Oversee end\-to\-end client lifecycle management, ensuring excellent service and client satisfaction.

**3\. Sales \& Revenue Growth**

* Achieve and exceed sales targets by driving new business acquisitions and expanding existing accounts.
* Develop and execute sales plans, lead conversion strategies, and revenue forecasting models.
* Track and analyze sales performance metrics, adjusting strategies as needed to maximize revenue growth.

**4\. Market Research \& Competitor Analysis**

* Conduct market research to identify emerging trends, new business opportunities, and competitive advantages.
* Monitor industry developments, competitor activities, and customer preferences to refine sales strategies.
* Utilize insights from market analysis to position Spacedraft as a leader in the construction and interior turnkey fitout industry.

**5\. Team Leadership \& Development**

* Lead, mentor, and motivate the business development team to achieve high performance.
* Provide training and guidance to improve team capabilities and ensure goal alignment.
* Foster a culture of innovation, teamwork, and accountability within the business development department.

**6\. Strategic Partnerships \& Networking**

* Identify and collaborate with potential partners, vendors, and consultants to drive business growth.
* Represent Spacedraft India Private Ltd at industry conferences, networking events, and business forums.
* Establish and nurture relationships with architects, contractors, and real estate developers to generate business leads.

**7\. Finullcial \& Operational Planning**

* Work closely with the finullce team to ensure business development efforts align with finullcial targets.
* Develop budgets and cost\-effective strategies to optimize sales and marketing expenditure.
* Monitor finullcial performance and provide reports to senior management on business development progress.

**8\. Contract \& Risk Management**

* Oversee contract negotiations, ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory requirements.
* Identify and mitigate potential business risks related to new deals and partnerships.
* Ensure all agreements align with company policies and profitability goals.

**Qualifications \& Skills:**

* Bachelorâ€™s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred).
* **Minimum 10\+ years of experience in business development, sales, or a related role, preferably in the construction or interior fitout industry.**
* Proven track record of achieving revenue targets and driving business growth.
* Strong leadership, communication, and negotiation skills.
* Excellent strategic planning and analytical abilities.
* Proficiency in CRM software, market analysis tools, and Microsoft Office Suite.
* Ability to work under pressure, manage multiple priorities, and meet deadlines.

**Key Competencies:**

* Business acumen and strategic thinking
* Strong client relationship management
* Effective leadership and team development
* Market research and competitive analysis
* Sales forecasting and finullcial planning
* Excellent problem\-solving and decision\-making skills

Job Type: Full\-time

Benefits:

* Food provided
* Leave encashment
* Provident Fund

Schedule:

* Day shift
* Fixed shift

Experience:

* total work: 10 years (Required)

Work Location: In person
